H0.text: What was the occupation of Mr. Sowerberry, in ‘Oliver Twist’. Undertaker

H1.text: What was the occupation of Mr. Sowerberry, in ‘Oliver Twist’. Coffin Maker

H2.text: What was the occupation of Mr. Sowerberry, in ‘Oliver Twist’. Mortician

H3.text: What was the occupation of Mr. Sowerberry, in ‘Oliver Twist’. 21-1

A4.text: he is taken on by Mr Sowerberry, an undertaker
